00020  * XSECURIResolverGenericWin32 := A URI Resolver that will work "out of
00021  *                                the box" with Windows.  Re-implements
00022  *                                much Xerces code, but allows us to
00023  *                                handle HTTP redirects as is required by
00024  *                                the DSIG Standard
00025  *
00026  * $Id: XSECURIResolverGenericWin32_8hpp-source.html,v 1.1.1.1 2006/08/21 08:14:59 baiqian Exp $

00028  * no message

00037  *
